response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation of its worth, I propose to offer it to you at a price of $950,000. This amount reflects the unique qualities and benefits this product provides, which I believe align well with your expectations and needs. Should you choose to accept this offer, I assure you of a seamless transaction and the highest level of service to ensure your satisfaction. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
